name: Hunted (itch) (Hazarth)
description:
You're a ghost that is being hunted by ghost hunters and all you have is the ability to posses shotguns :)

Version 2 Changelog:

  • Added a few more structures to the map.
  • Added some feedback when enemies get hit in the form of a red flash and some kickback
  • Fixed a bug with the pickup where it wasn't possible to pick it up immediately after starting the game

Project was made with Godot 4 - Beta 2 for the Mini Jam 117

Theme was :Ghosts

Limitation: Shotgun as a mechanic

Team size: 2

Unfortunately due to life stuff we weren't able to work the entire 3 days on this ^^; but it was still fun and we learned plenty of new stuff! So I call that a success :3
It also seems the Web export is broken ;_;
